name: Enjoy Learning National Parks of Japan
name_original: Enjoy Learning National Parks of Japan
description:
This is an app that lets you enjoy Japan's national parks in a game setting.
All 32 national parks with their famous sites are taking stage, including Myoko Togakushi National Park, which was officially declared a national park last March 27th, 2015.
With the View Mode, you can take a look at famous sites through beautiful photos.
Enjoy Japan's beautiful sceneries season by season.

With the World Ranking, you can compete with players from all over the world to see who has the fastest clear time. You can also obtain different panels depending on your clear time, so take the challenge and enjoy as many times as you want.

※The language used within the app is Japanese.
